text: Nɨbɨlaŋ 26.23 Ais 42.6, 49.6, Lu 24.26, 24.44-47, 1 Ko 15.20, Kl 1.18 nameŋ abavɨhadami uami. Hulaŋ Asɨ lɨbɨmɨŋavɨla hulaŋ iamɨgali ahɨliahuiahu saŋ abɨci vebali agaŋ avɨha avɨha igavɨla hɨmɨbali aba abavɨhadami uami. Hɨmɨci Asɨ abɨci nɨbu mɨse cɨhu hɨhi iahɨbali aba abavɨhadami uami. Nɨbu Asɨ dɨ abɨlu agasaŋ Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ agɨladɨdaŋ hɨdɨlɨ mu mu agɨladɨdaŋ abɨbali aba abavɨhadami uami.
